description: RXX files, where "XX" is a number from 00 to 99, are usually created to save a large archive on multiple disks. File archives using the ".rxx" file extensions format may be created using RAR for Mac and Unix or WinRAR for Windows.

NOTE: The WinRAR software installer registers file associations for the file extensions .R00 - R29, but it does not register associations for R30 and beyond. Therefore, you may see a WinRAR icon for R00 - R29 files but not for R30 files, even though WinRAR can still open R30 files that are part of a split archive.
